meta-review.comment: Piczle Cross: Story of Seasons blends nonogram puzzles with the charming world of Story of Seasons, providing a delightful gaming experience for puzzle enthusiasts and farming sim fans. While it may not revolutionize the genre, the game offers well-made, fun-to-solve puzzles that will keep players entertained. The integration of the Story of Seasons theme adds a fresh twist to the nonogram gameplay. It's a heart-warming good time that is worth a try, especially for those who appreciate both genres.
